idea-plugin.name: JavaGenerate
idea-plugin.description:
The tedious mechanical operations during java development are generated by one key:

  1. Generate API interface document of controller layer (markdown format)
    • Usage: in the generate operation bar, i.e. under the directory of idea to generate get & set methods
    • Generate an MD file in the format of interface document timestamp under the current classpath
    • Select the blank space in the class name to generate the document of the public method in the class
    • Select the method name to generate the method document (non-public methods are supported for single method selection)
    • The first line of multi line comments is the interface name or parameter
    • Support @ postmapping, @ getmapping, @ deletemapping, @ putmapping annotation and generate corresponding API documents
    • The @ requestmapping annotation can be added to the class name to generate the corresponding API document link

JAVA开发过程中繁琐的机械操作进行一键生成：

  1. 生成Controller层的API接口文档（MarkDown格式）
    • 使用方法：在Generate操作栏中,即：idea自带生成GET&SET方法的目录下
    • 在当前类路径下生成《接口文档-时间戳》格式的md文件
    • 选择类名中空白处，生成该类中public方法的文档
    • 选中方法名，生成该方法文档（选择单方法支持非public方法）
    • 多行注释的第一行为 接口名 或者 参数备
    • 支持@PostMapping, @GetMapping, @DeleteMapping, @PutMapping注解，生成对应API文档
    • 支持类名上添加@RequestMapping注解，生成对应的API文档链接
